Up.Statement: IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'w2_RealShop' AND COLUMN_NAME = 'brand_id') BEGIN ALTER TABLE w2_RealShop ADD brand_id nvarchar (30) NOT NULL DEFAULT (N''); END GO IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'w2_RealShop' AND COLUMN_NAME = 'area_id') BEGIN ALTER TABLE w2_RealShop ADD area_id nvarchar (30) NOT NULL DEFAULT (N''); END GO IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'w2_RealShop' AND COLUMN_NAME = 'longitude') BEGIN ALTER TABLE w2_RealShop ADD longitude decimal (9,6); END GO IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'w2_RealShop' AND COLUMN_NAME = 'latitude') BEGIN ALTER TABLE w2_RealShop ADD latitude decimal (9,6); END GO IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'w2_WorkRealShop' AND COLUMN_NAME = 'brand_id') BEGIN ALTER TABLE w2_WorkRealShop ADD brand_id nvarchar (30) NOT NULL DEFAULT (N''); END GO IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'w2_WorkRealShop' AND COLUMN_NAME = 'area_id') BEGIN ALTER TABLE w2_WorkRealShop ADD area_id nvarchar (30) NOT NULL DEFAULT (N''); END GO IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'w2_WorkRealShop' AND COLUMN_NAME = 'longitude') BEGIN ALTER TABLE w2_WorkRealShop ADD longitude decimal (9,6); END GO IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'w2_WorkRealShop' AND COLUMN_NAME = 'latitude') BEGIN ALTER TABLE w2_WorkRealShop ADD latitude decimal (9,6); END GO
